clientProperties.description: Properties of the Apache Kafka producer client. For more info, see the [AWS documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/developerguide/apache-kafka-rule-action.html).

destinationArn.description: The ARN of Kafka action's VPC `aws.iot.TopicRuleDestination`.

headers.description: The list of Kafka headers that you specify. Nested arguments below.

topic.description: The Kafka topic for messages to be sent to the Kafka broker.
